title: New Queues Broken for me this patch
body:
I know that this patch some elements were put in place to reduce diamond + queue times at the cost of matchmaking, but currently my matchmaking and my queue times are suffering. I've gone from 6 minute queues at peak time as a support player to 15-20 minute queues, and I'm getting plat 5's and masters in the same game after all that waiting.

This seems to be much more prominent in mid diamond and less so low diamond and high diamond. But it's really degrading to have 10 super imbalanced games in a row, and gaining gains like +6, +11, +12, +14, +15. 

Whatever happened it seems that I've fallen into the minority that suffer from the result :(
